thread.title: SunEdison to Buy Vivint for $2.2 Billion to Expand Solar Power
thread.title_full: SunEdison to Buy Vivint for $2.2 Billion to Expand Solar Power - Bloomberg Business

author: Amanda Jordan
title: SunEdison to Buy Vivint for $2.2 Billion to Expand Solar Power
text:
SunEdison Inc. agreed to acquire Vivint Solar for about $2.2 billion to expand in residential and commercial solar power.
Vivint Solar holders will receive $16.50 a share, consisting of $9.89 in cash, $3.31 in SunEdison stock and $3.30 in convertible notes, according to a regulatory statement on July 20.
TerraForm Power Inc. will subsequently acquire Vivintâ€™s rooftop solar portfolio, consisting of 523 megawatts to be installed by year-end, for $922 million in cash, according to the statement.
